skills.infoProjects: * Projects are being sorted by the project importance/complexity. So basically, on the top there are my best projects I'm proud of. On the bottom of the list are the projects which are not that important and complex.
skills.infoSkills: * Skills are being sorted by the skills knowledge level. So basically, on the top there are skills I've been using for a long time aspecially as a commercial usage. On the bottom, there are skills I'm not that familiar with, but still used them in some projects (also commercial).
